title: AdExtraction
description: Simple extraction schema for basic LLM. All fields are direct copy or keyword spotting. No reasoning.

title.description: Job title - extract directly from text

posted_time.description: When posted - extract time phrase like 'Posted about 9 hours ago'

ends_time.description: When job ends - extract phrase like 'Ends in 6 days'

budget.description: Budget or rate - extract currency and amount like '$10-30 USD' or 'â‚¹100-400 INR / hour'

payment_terms.description: Payment terms if mentioned - e.g., 'Paid on delivery', 'Fixed price'

requirements.description: List of requirements - extract from 'Requirements' or 'Ideal Skills' sections

raw_text.description: Original raw text of the job posting
